title: Guilty
body:
I just feel guilty for calling a person bad player :( {{item:3070}}  idk but I just cant be those people who keep saying bad stuff, all I said was why you playing so bad, its not acceptable you are really bad in this game so bad. those were my sentence after game, in chat logs. After coming out I check person he was B5

Confused

Should I add him and just say sorry or leave it because he is b5 0 LP with 20 games losing streak ?

replies.body: its better to check your teammates during champion select instead of post game
no he was not in my team, he was from enemy team :/ but its ok I think if he don't listen n play well he cant improve >.>
if its 20 loss streak then he is bad. No matter how many retards there are, you cant have that many losses unless its you
that's what made me confuse :( should I say it or not, bcoz its hard to believe to see some one lose 20 rank games in a row :/
Try to better yourself by attempting to apologize. Their skill level doesn't matter. You know its the right thing to do.
send friend request no response, don't think so he will add lol :/
